thread.title: Mariners fire Lloyd McClendon after 2 seasons
thread.title_full: Mariners fire Lloyd McClendon after 2 seasons

author: TIM BOOTH
title: Mariners fire Lloyd McClendon after 2 seasons
text:
Elaine Thompson Mariners fire Lloyd McClendon after 2 seasons 
FILE - In this June 24, 2015, file photo, Seattle Mariners manager Lloyd McClendon rubs his eyes after a run by the Kansas City Royals during the fourth inning of a baseball game in Seattle. The Mariners have fired manager Lloyd McClendon after two seasons, Friday, Oct. 9, 2015, less than a week after the Mariners concluded a disappointing 76-86 season. (AP Photo/Elaine Thompson, File) Ted S. Warren Mariners fire Lloyd McClendon after 2 seasons 
FILE - In this May 15, 2015, file photo, Seattle Mariners' Lloyd McClendon leans on the dugout rail before a baseball game against the Boston Red Sox in Seattle. The Mariners have fired manager Lloyd McClendon after two seasons, Friday, Oct. 9, 2015, less than a week after the Mariners concluded a disappointing 76-86 season. (AP Photo/Ted S. Warren, File) Elaine Thompson Mariners fire Lloyd McClendon after 2 seasons 
FILE - In this June 2, 2015, file photo, Seattle Mariners manager Lloyd McClendon, left, yells as he talks with umpire Will Little after being ejected from the baseball game against the New York Yankees during the third inning, in Seattle. The Mariners have fired manager Lloyd McClendon after two seasons, Friday, Oct. 9, 2015, less than a week after the Mariners concluded a disappointing 76-86 season.(AP Photo/Elaine Thompson, File) Duane Burleson Mariners fire Lloyd McClendon after 2 seasons 
FILE - In this July 23, 2015, file photo, Seattle Mariners manager Lloyd McClendon watches from the dugout during a baseball game against the Detroit Tigers in Detroit. The Mariners have fired manager Lloyd McClendon after two seasons, Friday, Oct. 9, 2015, less than a week after the Mariners concluded a disappointing 76-86 season.(AP Photo/Duane Burleson, File) Ted S. Warren Mariners fire Lloyd McClendon after 2 seasons 
FILE - In this Oct. 3, 2015, file photo, Seattle Mariners manager Lloyd McClendon points towards first base while questioning an umpire's call in the first inning of a baseball game against the Oakland Athletics in Seattle. The Mariners have fired manager Lloyd McClendon after two seasons, Friday, Oct. 9, 2015, less than a week after the Mariners concluded a disappointing 76-86 season.(AP Photo/Ted S. Warren, File) Posted: Friday, October 9, 2015 12:31 pm | Updated: 2:01 pm, Fri Oct 9, 2015. Mariners fire Lloyd McClendon after 2 seasons Associated Press | 
SEATTLE (AP) — Given the opportunity that he didn't get in his previous stop as a general manager, Jerry Dipoto decided the best move for the Seattle Mariners was to bring in his own field boss from the start. 
That was reasoning behind Dipoto's decision to fire manager Lloyd McClendon on Friday after two seasons. Instead of moving forward with someone who had differing baseball views, Dipoto will start his tenure in Seattle with someone he chooses.
